arts.ttl: BREAKING: Brighton issue Jan Paul van Hecke statement after horror collision led to emergency care
arts.sum: Jan Paul van Hecke needed oxygen and was put in a neck brace after colliding with Brentford midfielder Yunus Konak late in Brighton's 4-2 defeat in the Premier League on Saturday

arts.ttl: Van Hecke discharged after head injury in Brighton's loss to Brentford
arts.sum: Brighton have announced that Jan Paul van Hecke has been discharged from hospital after sustaining a head injury against Brentford. The defender was stretchered off at the Gtech Community Stadium after colliding with Yunus Emre Konak when challenging for a header.

arts.ttl: Mbeumo and Wissa star as Brentford beat 10-man Brighton
arts.sum: Bryan Mbeumo and Yoane Wissa starred as Brentford beat 10-man Brighton & Hove Albion 4-2 in the Premier League to keep their European hopes alive. The goals took Mbeumo to 18 and Wissa to 16 Premier League strikes this season, with only Mohamed Salah, Alexander Isak, Erling Haaland and Chris Wood keeping pace.

arts.ttl: 13 Brighton fan photos before disastrous defeat to Brentford
arts.sum: We took photos of Brighton fans before a woeful Albion display away to Brentford in a Premier League clash.

arts.ttl: Frank relieved after Brentford end wait for home win
arts.sum: Thomas Frank was relieved after what he described as a “very big win” for Brentford. The Bees’ 4-2 victory over Brighton maintained their outside chance of European football next season – and was their first win at home since early December. They are 11th in the Premier League table with five games remaining. Boss Frank […] The post Frank relieved after Brentford end wait for home win appeared first on West London Sport.

Bryan Mbeumo scored twice as Brentford won at home for the first time since early December. Here’s how we rated each Bees player in the 4-2 victory against Brighton. Possibly could […] The post Brentford v Brighton player ratings appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: 'They have an opinion' - Fabian Hurzeler responds to chants from Brighton fans after controversial substitution
arts.sum: Fabian Hurzeler has responded after some of the travelling Brighton fans questioned his substitutions at Brentford.

arts.ttl: Seagulls' made too many mistakes - Hurzeler
arts.sum: Brighton manager Fabian Hurzeler says Brighton "showed a great reaction" to going a man down, but beleives his side "made too many easy mistakes" in their 4-2 loss at Brentford.

arts.ttl: Jan Paul van Hecke Rushed to Hospital With Head Injury Suffered in Brentford 4-2 Brighton
arts.sum: Brighton defender Jan Paul van Hecke was stretchered off after receiving almost 10 minutes of treatment on a head injury vs Brentford.

arts.ttl: Brighton issue official update as star man rushed to hospital after Brentford incident
arts.sum: Brighton defender suffers a nasty head injury during the 4-2 loss at Brentford
